title: The Blue men of Morocco
brief_description: The strange story of a mysterious nomadic desert tribe of Arabs almost unknown to the outside world. The religious customs and strange ways of life of these people whose skin acquires its colour from the dye in their clothing. Explains how the tribe earns a living and describes a camel trip over the Sahara Desert and across the Atlas mountains to the city of Marrakesh. No other credits available.
